channel.title: [SFM] [Interest / Hype Check] Forever Evil: DC Comics and the War of the Syndicated Supermages SFM
channel.description:
Hi all, Right now I'm working on a new setup with TBE and we're making progress fast. It will be a closed 28P game with DC Comics flavour.
The town faction will be known as the Crime Syndicate — Maleficent Supermage Alliance, and will be composed of a mixture of members of the Crime Syndicate, an evil version of the Justice League from an alternative earth: https://dc.fandom.com/wiki/Crime_Syndicate_(Earth_3), as well as evil magic users from the original earth.
I cannot reveal anything else about the game at this time, but what I can say is that it WILL be like virtuous: Evil characters will be town, and Good characters will be scum.
Pls post if u might be interested in playing! TY!

item.title: [SFM] [Interest / Hype Check] Forever Evil: DC Comics and the War of the Syndicated Supermages SFM
item.dc:creator: N.1
item.description:
I’m seeking a third designer to help increase the odds that this game doesn’t get denied in the review phase. Please ping me if interested (if you do this you may co-host as well if you’d like) and I’ll add you. Note as usual for closed stuff if u come on as a designer, u cant play

Read full topic
